EmailTemplate.name: CSO - Orders Missing Info
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support. Your case tracking number for this inquiry is provided above. If you wish to communicate with us further about this inquiry, you may reply to this e-mail -- please leave the Reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses
Please review and provide the following missing information so we can proceed with placing your order.
End User and Final Destination Required:
In order to help Honeywell comply with U.S. Export Regulations (Part 736 and 744), please provide the End User (EU) and Final Destination (FD) for the products you are purchasing, under this Purchase Order. (U.S. Export Administration Regulations URL: http://www.access.gpo.gov/bis/ear/ear_data.html)
EU: __________________________________________________ FD: __________________________________________________
P/N may NOT be eligible for 8130 Tags:
This P/N may not be eligible for 8130 Tags. Further research will be required.
Product/Part #: _________________________________________
Please provide the following information: Cage Code: ___________________________________________ Next Higher Assembly: ___________________________________ End Item: _____________________________________________ Component Maintenance Manual: __________________________
Please confirm acceptance of Certificate of Conformance. Date: _________________________________________________ Signature: _____________________________________________
<Insert body of message here>
Visit the exciting new options on our improved, easier to navigate Web Portal at www.myaerospace.com . You can now obtain real time price and availability, place orders and check order status online for avionics, mechanical, wheels and brakes products and exchange programs (SPEX), globally for all of our customers.
You will enjoy FASTER, even immediate response times compared to requests placed by email or fax. Current response times for non-Web requests are: Orders – 24 hours Order Status – 48 hours Quotes – 72 hours
In the event these response times exceed your requirements or you are AOG, please call us at 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099.
Thank you, we appreciate your business!
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com
Due to government regulations and/or contractual limitations, all data and/or attachments containing export control information and/or containing details related to Space, Munitions and Missiles items is not authorized for entry or use in our applications or systems at the present time
